report.title: Blocked
report.author: Buprenorphine
report.bodytext: 16 mg. or more Bupe' will form a MAJOR Blockade for at least 48 hours---My experience as follows: /n /n 2mg/IV Dilauded after 20 hours------------------BLOCKED! /n 1mg/transmucosal(intranasally)after 33 hours----BLOCKED! /n 50mg/oral oxycodone after 60 hours--------------BLOCKED! /n 40mg/oral methadone after 24 hours--------------BLOCKED! /n /n But*100mg/oral methadone after 48 hours OVERCAME blockade /n 'Dreamy high produced!!!'
